verbatim_example: I've been messing around with heroin and bupe since about April - my most recent relapse. IV dope user for ~8 years.

I didn't sleep for a 4 day span in the past 2 weeks. I get so easily over-whelmed, and that feeling is really magnified when I stop dosing.

I only sleep hour stints, last week I was up for 4 days straight. Everything bothers me, my place is trashed from not doing crap for months, I worry that I won't get better and need to get a new job. My motor skills aren't working because of all the anxiety I add to a rough situation and the lack of sleep I get.
